channel.title: Can these sort of servers be hosted on a physical server?
channel.description:
please dont spam this thread post an answer or dont post at all ;)
at the moment servers like testscape/pimpscape etc are ran from peoples computers and have an ultimate max capacity of about 70 i would think, if you go on a random site like dell.com and click servers could you run for example, testscape off one of them?

item.title: Can these sort of servers be hosted on a physical server?
item.dc:creator: @superstuntguy superstuntguy
item.description:
@superstuntguy wrote:

Yes, they are regular computers, but not designed to be used to play games etc.
You’re going to need a knowledge of linux to be able to use a server like that.
For me, I just pick up old & unwanted computers from people and load balance them so even a crappy computer works just fine.

Read full topic
item.source: Can these sort of servers be hosted on a physical server?
